snippet: Controversy has grown at the college, where nearly a fifth of the undergraduate population is Jewish, over the event organized by a student group, Students for Justice in Palestine.
abstract: Controversy grows at Brooklyn College over the college-sponsored appearance of two pro-Palestinian speakers from group Boycott, Divestment and Sanctions, which advocates Israeli withdrawal from disputed territories; protesters gather at the school, where nearly a fifth of the undergraduate population is Jewish.
lead_paragraph: Controversy has grown at the college, where nearly a fifth of the undergraduate population is Jewish, over the event organized by a student group, Students for Justice in Palestine.

headline.seo: Pro-Palestine Speakers at Brooklyn College Attract Protests Outside

headline.print_headline: Pro-Palestine Speakers at Brooklyn College Attract Protests Outside
